sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:shipment: Viral particles are shipped frozen on dry ice. Plasmid DNA (≥ 200ng) will also be included in the shipment.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: The subcellular organization of neocortical excitatory connections. Leopoldo Petreanu, Tianyi Mao, Scott M. Sternson & Karel Svoboda. Nature. 2009 Jan 18. 10.1038/nature07709 PubMed 19151697
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pACAGW-ChR2-Venus-AAV was a gift from Karel Svoboda (Addgene plasmid # 20071 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:20071 ; RRID:Addgene_20071) For viral preps, please replace (Addgene plasmid # 20071) in the above sentence with: (Addgene viral prep # 20071-AAV1) or (Addgene viral prep # 20071-AAV9)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pCAG-F

ChR2

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:storage: Store at -80℃. Thaw just before use and keep on ice.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:pricing: $350 USD for preparation of 100 µL virus + $30 USD for plasmid.
